_header: With that need n[ ]…/helpen them with thogh[ ]
_description: Prayer(?), in fragment, mostly erased — twelve lines

CamCCC327.First Lines:
…mid that nid n[ ][ ] helpen hem wuþ
                    þoch…
CamCCC327.Last Lines: …and fare as forell [ ][ ] wor tune null…
